contest-event.event-date:
April 3, 1899 D Lydney Contest
Lydney Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
lydney-contest
None
Lucia di Lammermoor - Selection [arr. Round]
Lydney, Gloucestershire 1st prize £12.12s. and baritone. 2nd prize £9.9s. 3rd prize £5.5s. 4th prize £3.3s. 5th prize £1.10s. March contest 1st (£1.1s.) Wednesbury Crown Tube, 2nd (10s.6d.) Prince's End. 7 bands competed.
April 10, 2012, 1:28 p.m. Jan. 30, 2020, 7:36 p.m.
1 Wednesbury Crown Tube Thomas German
2 Bristol Victoria J. E. Wilkinson
3 Northfield Braithet Llewelyn Fewster
4 Pillowell Silver Band William Holdsworth
5 Prince's End Temperance J. W. Thomas
6 Lydney Band George Dimmock
7 Bream Silver Band C. Cridland
